execution_plan.description: Get customers in Germany from the EU sales database who have placed at least one order (filter and existence check done inside the same database).
execution_plan.query: SELECT c.id AS customer_id, c.email AS email, c.full_name AS full_name FROM customers c WHERE c.country = 'DE' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM orders o WHERE o.customer_id = c.id);

execution_plan.description: Get customers in Germany from the US sales database who have placed at least one order (filter and existence check done inside the same database).
execution_plan.query: SELECT c.id AS customer_id, c.email AS email, c.full_name AS full_name FROM customers c WHERE c.country = 'DE' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM orders o WHERE o.customer_id = c.id);

execution_plan.description: Get customers who are located in Germany from the central users database (customer details). These customers will be checked for orders in the orders database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, customer_first_name, customer_last_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE country = 'DE' OR country ILIKE '%germ%';

execution_plan.description: Find which of the users_db customers returned in step 3 have placed at least one order in the orders database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM Orders WHERE customer_id IN ($step3.customer_id);
